title: Vik and Tara get a Puppy
description: Siblings Vik and Tara convince their parents to get a puppy. The family then takes all the important steps, like who is going to care for the puppy and what to name it. The children soon learn that there is more to getting a puppy than playtime, as they learn the responsibility that comes with a pet. A fun and endearing story for any family looking to get a pet!
author: Pria Dee
